Title: Rising Tides/Crashing Skies
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Lamar Abrams, Hellen Jo, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Ronaldo is creating a documentary about whether Steven and the Crystal Gems are safe for the town of Beach City.
